statements: DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 100 AND interaction_type = 'login';
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01' OR interaction_details->>'outcome' = 'win';
DELETE FROM players WHERE player_id = 123 AND player_level > 50;
DELETE FROM player_interactions WHERE interaction_id IN (SELECT interaction_id FROM player_interactions WHERE player_id = 456) AND interaction_type = 'comment';
DELETE FROM GameRecords WHERE game_id = 1001 AND player_id = 5;
DELETE FROM GameRecords WHERE game_result = 'win' AND score > 100;
DELETE FROM PlayerInteractions WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'comment' AND interaction_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM player_data WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM game_scores WHERE player_id = 101 AND level_id = 3;
